uk.ac.nottingham.controllers

Class WelcomeScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.nottingham.controllers.WelcomeScreenController

  • public class WelcomeScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
    WelcomeScreenController class to launch other screens. Handles reloading of the fxml files, which are then set on the stage.
